Alchemist.1: Alchemists ignore collision and never stop moving.

Avatar.1: Avatar's Origin Element is counted twice for Trait bonuses.

Berserker.3: Berserkers have a 45% chance to hit all units in cone in front of them and apply on-hit effects.
Berserker.6: Berserkers have a 100% chance to hit all units in cone in front of them and apply on-hit effects.

Blademaster.2: 40% chance to trigger 1 additional attack against their target.
Blademaster.4: 40% chance to trigger 2 additional attacks against their target.
Blademaster.6: 40% chance to trigger 3 additional attacks against their target.

Mage.3: Mages have a 50% chance cast an additional time
Mage.6: Mages have a 100% chance cast an additional time

Predator.3: Predators instantly kill enemies they damage who are below 25% health.

Ranger.2: Rangers have a 30% chance to gain double attack speed for 3 seconds every 3 seconds.
Ranger.4: Rangers have a 60% chance to gain double attack speed for 3 seconds every 3 seconds.
Ranger.6: Rangers have a 100% chance to gain double attack speed for 3 seconds every 3 seconds.

Summoner.3: Summoned units gain +40% bonus health and last longer
Summoner.6: Summoned units gain +40% bonus health and last longer

Cloud.2: All allies have a 15% chance to dodge enemy basic attacks.
Cloud.3: All allies have a 20% chance to dodge enemy basic attacks.
Cloud.4: All allies have a 30% chance to dodge enemy basic attacks.

Crystal.2: Crystal units take a maximum of 100 damange from a single attack or ability hit.
Crystal.4: Crystal units take a maximum of 60 damange from a single attack or ability hit.

Electric.2: Electric units shock nearby enemies for 70 damage whenever they deal or receive a critical strike.
Electric.3: Electric units shock nearby enemies for 250 damage whenever they deal or receive a critical strike.
Electric.4: Electric units shock nearby enemies for 500 damage whenever they deal or receive a critical strike.

Glacial.2: Glacial units basic attacks have a 20% chance to stun their target for 1.5 seconds on-hit.
Glacial.4: Glacial units basic attacks have a 40% chance to stun their target for 1.5 seconds on-hit.
Glacial.6: Glacial units basic attacks have a 60% chance to stun their target for 1.5 seconds on-hit.

Inferno.3: Inferno spells burn the ground beneath the target, dealing 80% of that spell's pre-mitigation damage as magic damage over 5 seconds.
Inferno.6: Inferno spells burn the ground beneath the target, dealing 175% of that spell's pre-mitigation damage as magic damage over 5 seconds.
Inferno.9: Inferno spells burn the ground beneath the target, dealing 275% of that spell's pre-mitigation damage as magic damage over 5 seconds.

Light.3: When a Light unit dies, all other Light units gain +10% bonus attack speed and are healed for 25% of their maximum health.
Light.6: When a Light unit dies, all other Light units gain +20% bonus attack speed and are healed for 25% of their maximum health.
Light.9: When a Light unit dies, all other Light units gain +35% bonus attack speed and are healed for 25% of their maximum health.

Mountain.2: At the start of combat, a random ally gains a 1500 health stoneshield.

Ocean.2: All allies restore +15 mana every 4 seconds.
Ocean.4: All allies restore +30 mana every 4 seconds.
Ocean.6: All allies restore +50 mana every 4 seconds.

Poison.3: Poison units apply Neurotoxin when they deal damage, increasing the mana cost of the target's spell by 50%.

Shadow.2: Shadow units deal +50% increased damage for 5 seconds at combat start, refreshed on self takedown.
Shadow.4: Shadow units deal +100% increased damage for 5 seconds at combat start, refreshed on any Shadow unit takedown.

Steel.2: Steel units gain damage immunity for a 2 seconds when they are reduced below 50% health.
Steel.3: Steel units gain damage immunity for a 3 seconds when they are reduced below 50% health.
Steel.4: Steel units gain damage immunity for a 4 seconds when they are reduced below 50% health.

Woodland.3: At the start of combat, a random Woodland champion makes a copy of themselves (excluding items).
